full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BTZAN GYI GSOL MCHOD 'PHRUL GYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BTZAN GSOL 'PHRUL GYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHU RE CHEN PO'I DAR HAN AEM CHI'I KHAMS TSAN GYI DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS KYI SKU'I RIM 'GRO'I 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES KHAMS TSAN RING BLA MA DGE SLONG YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN DANG, DBYANGS PA BLO BZANG RDO RJES BSKUL BA LTAR ^BTZUN PA WA GINDRA PA tU SIDDHIS BRIS PAS 'GRO BA RNAMS DANG RGYAL GYI 'CHAR SGO LAS THAR BAR GYUR CIG ,)
